item.description:
Bonjour tout le monde! Do you love French language and culture?
For this meeting, there's a theme! Please come talk about a sport that you play,saw or like (in French, of course).
Il ya beaucoup de gens who want to practice speaking French. They would like to parler avec vous! Venez prendre un caf√© and patisserie chez Panera. Look for the table with the Tour Eiffel!!
We meet the 2nd and 4th Wednesday of each month at 7PM. Not everyone RSVP's, so there are usually many more people than shown here.
Bienvenue!
item.how_to_find_us: Look for the tables in the back with the Eiffel Tower!
item.why: An interesting evening! The people are very nice and it is a friendly atmosphere.

group.name: The West Hartford Groupe de French

item.name: The West Hartford Groupe de French April Meeting
